panels.description: Displays up/down status for the selected database.
panels.title: Database up

panels.description: Displays up/down status for each shard related to the database.
panels.title: Shards up

panels.description: Displays up/down status for each node related to the database.
panels.title: Nodes up

panels.description: Rate of read and write requests.
panels.title: Database operations

panels.description: Average rate of read and write latency
panels.title: Database average latency

panels.description: Number of keys in the database.
panels.title: Database key count

panels.description: Percentage of read operations that result in a cache hit.

targets.expr: bdb_read_hits{redis_cluster=~"$redis_cluster", job=~"$job", bdb=~"$database"} / clamp_min(bdb_read_misses{redis_cluster=~"$redis_cluster", job=~"$job", bdb=~"$database"} + bdb_read_hits{redis_cluster=~"$redis_cluster", job=~"$job", bdb=~"$database"}, 1) * 100

panels.title: Database cache hit ratio

panels.description: Rate of object expiration and eviction
panels.title: Database evictions vs expirations

panels.description: Calculated memory utilization % of the database compared to the limit.
panels.title: Database memory utilization

panels.description: RAM fragmentation ratio between RSS and allocated RAM.
panels.title: Database memory fragmentation ratio

panels.description:
Sync status for CRDB traffic.
- 0=in-sync
- 1=syncing
- 2=out of sync
panels.title: Sync status

panels.description: Lag between source and destination for CRDB traffic.
panels.title: Local lag

panels.description: Rate of compressed network traffic to the CRDB.
panels.title: CRDB ingress compressed

panels.description: Rate of decompressed network traffic to the CRDB.
panels.title: CRDB ingress decompressed
